project.description:
Mirror rethinkdb/ppa to dr-doom:/srv/rethinkdb-download-mirror/ubuntu
Trigger an update of download.rethinkdb.com

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
HERE=`pwd`
cat > mirror.list << EOF
set base_path $HERE set mirror_path /srv/rethinkdb-download-mirror/mirror set skel_path $HERE/skel set var_path $HERE/var set cleanscript $HERE/clean.sh set postmirror_script $var_path/postmirror.sh set run_postmirror 0 set nthreads 4 set _tilde 0
deb-i386 http://ppa.launchpad.net/rethinkdb/ppa/ubuntu precise main deb-amd64 http://ppa.launchpad.net/rethinkdb/ppa/ubuntu precise main deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/rethinkdb/ppa/ubuntu precise main
deb-i386 http://ppa.launchpad.net/rethinkdb/ppa/ubuntu lucid main deb-amd64 http://ppa.launchpad.net/rethinkdb/ppa/ubuntu lucid main deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/rethinkdb/ppa/ubuntu lucid main
deb-i386 http://ppa.launchpad.net/rethinkdb/ppa/ubuntu quantal main deb-amd64 http://ppa.launchpad.net/rethinkdb/ppa/ubuntu quantal main deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/rethinkdb/ppa/ubuntu quantal main
deb-i386 http://ppa.launchpad.net/rethinkdb/ppa/ubuntu raring main deb-amd64 http://ppa.launchpad.net/rethinkdb/ppa/ubuntu raring main deb-src http://ppa.launchpad.net/rethinkdb/ppa/ubuntu raring main
EOF
apt-mirror mirror.list
